assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kronos Advanced Technologies Inc. manufactures and distributes air movement and purification equipment. The company was formerly known as TSET, Inc. and changed its name to Kronos Advanced Technologies Inc. in January 2001. Kronos Advanced Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Lake Oswego, Oregon.
